ygData.subject: Re: Tuffer Tentacle Terrors
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats okay because I think any type of camping is lame :)  Never done it, and never will.  About the closest thing I have done to camping is go on a circuit in
ygData.messageBody:
Thats okay because I think any type of camping is lame :) Never done it,
and never will. About the closest thing I have done to camping is go on
a circuit in Paw. Ghanex, Captain/Shaman Lenrel, Ren Rex. Stop.
Rinse. Repeat. Never got a single good item either, but lots of exp.

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:coanj@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:53 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Tuffer Tentacle Terrors
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <coanj@...>
>
> THANK GOD, I think pulling monsters is lame...if you can't fight in the
> area, then you shouldn't be there....which in turn will help promote group
> play, rather than having a high level puller fetch a single monster at a
> time.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:48 PM
> > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Tuffer Tentacle Terrors
> >
> >
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > They seem to have made the Tentacle Terrors way more aggressive
> > and stronger
> > as well. I am level 21 and they are blue to white to me. My friend, a
> > level 30 ranger was helping me raise my 2handed skill (I just got a BBC)
> > with the TT. He would draw them out (they are green to him) and take
> all
> > the blows. They would consistently reduce him to one bubble and myself
> to
> > half my hit points.
> >
> > The day before they were a piece of cake, now there killing machines.
> >
> > They seem to have changed the linking also with the bonecracker.
> > It used to
> > be you could pull the BC and the two necros would not come (as
> > long as they
> > were green to the puller). Now they all come no matter what.
> >
> > AND finally blind spell pulling no longer works either. If you target a
> > mob, then run to another room (i.e. the mob cant see you) you could cast
> a
> > spell and the mob would come running. This no longer works.
> >
> > Just thought I would share that with you all.
> >
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> > http://www.onelist.com

> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> >
